capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm talking about Harry's belongings, and it seems like he has a pretty cool stealth jacket. I can confirm that it's one of his possessions, and I'm certain it's the real deal.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been told that Dudley is a guy. I'm not really sure about the details of his life, but it's interesting to note that being male can shape one's experiences and perspectives in many ways.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been thinking about Dudley and his gender. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty straightforward statement, but I suppose you never know what someone might say, right? Anyway, yeah, Dudley is definitely 11.

So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old, right? I think it's really cool how young he is, but at the same time, I'm a bit worried about him growing up too fast. (CERTAINTY: high) (POLARITY: neutral) (SENTIMENT: cautious) (EMOTION: slightly anxious)

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Harry is definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite sure about it, actually. He's always been a bit of a bespectacled guy, you know?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look pretty tall for a half-giant, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him towering over the rest of us in the Great Hall. It's one thing to hear about someone being tall, but it's another thing entirely when you see them standing right in front of you!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. you're a character who is surprisingly tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is looking a bit rough. He's got this weird lightning-shaped cut on it - I've never seen anything like it before. It's pretty concerning, to be honest.
